1.dialouge:
They've been a little bit more active around here recently.~
They make a living by-
1.speaker: Malo

2.dialouge:
I know.~
Magnis told me about them before.
2.speaker: Klay

3.dialouge: He even said I'll end up like them if I fail the selection.
3.speaker: Klay

4.dialouge:
He's just trying to scare you.~
There are plenty of other roles you can take even if you don't become Vanguard,~ which you will.
4.speaker: Malo

5.dialouge: Anyways,~ we shouldn't stay here for too long.~ The resident of the camp might come back.
5.speaker: Malo
